titleStmt.title: A vvord of reproof to the priests or ministers, who boast of their ministery and ordinances, and yet live in pride, disdain, persecution, &c. Shevving what such are; and how little cause they have to exclaim against those who separate from them. As also a word to the papists discovering their foundation to be carnal and sandie. In a letter sent to some supposed priests or Jesuites in the north, by William Tomlinson.
titleStmt.author: Tomlinson, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Wayte, and are to be sold at the Pavement in York,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
